summary: This mod fixes the head/body color mismatch with Khajiit Amazonian mod by Citamorf. I take no credit for that mod, as I had no part in its creation.
descriptionHtml:
This mod fixes the head/body color mismatch with Khajiit Amazonian mod by Citamorf. I take no credit for that mod, as I had no part in its creation.

To use this fix, you will need... of course. The actual mod located here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15230
author: Citamorf - Fix by Aderic
